definition: a rich sweet made of flavored sugar and often combined with fruit or nuts, to make into an elaborately constructed thing
details:
noun
- a rich sweet made of flavored sugar and often combined with fruit or nuts
= synonyms: candy
verb
- to make into an elaborately constructed thing
= example: to make into an elaborately constructed thing
= synonyms: confection
- to make or construct
= example: to make or construct
